description: Data was extracted from TCGA DCC on July 2016 for copy-number segment identification data.

fields.description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001
fields.name: ParticipantBarcode

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: SampleBarcode

fields.description: Letter code of the sample type using the TCGA standards, eg TPN, EBV. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-TCGA-users/TCGA-code-tables/sample-type-codes
fields.name: SampleTypeLetterCode

fields.description: TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-TCGA-users/TCGA-code-tables/TCGA-study-abbreviations
fields.name: Study

fields.description: Platform used to generate these data (Genome_Wide_SNP_6)
fields.name: Platform

fields.description: Chromosome, possible values: 1, X, etc (ie does not include chr prefix)
fields.name: Chromosome

fields.description: The start position for this particular segment. Example: 3218610
fields.name: Start

fields.description: The end position for this particular segment. Example: 50613772
fields.name: End

fields.description: The number of probes from the Genome Wide SNP6 array that went into estimating this segment. (Segments based on a small number of probes are likely to be noisier than estimates based on a large number of probes)Examples: 16922, 2, 5, 59949
fields.name: Num_Probes

fields.description: The mean copy-number value estimated for this segment -- the value is log2(copy-number/2), centered at 0 (corresponding to a normal copy-number value of 2).Examples:0.0049, -0.0011, 0.0032
fields.name: Segment_Mean
